title: Bug with Hextech Crafting
body:
I leveled up Garen to level 7 without having the required essence, note that I had the 3 tokens required but had 400/600 essence. When I tried to upgrade an error ocurred but when I checked the champion list I noticed that Garen was level 7 and no essence was used, also the 3 tokens were still there. I changed to the legacy client and I got the notification that I just got to level 7 on Garen. 

I've reported this using the report option on the client but I'm posting this here for clarity.

Sorry for any typing errors

replies.body: If you close and relog the legacy client, does it still show lvl 7 on that champ in profile or on the champs page? Trying to figure out if it's just a visual bug.

I don't think this is a visual bug, I can use the emote ingame
Ill post some screenshots below to give some info on the issue.


http://prntscr.com/cljskb -  Profile shows level 7 on both clients

http://prntscr.com/cljtlk  -  Hextech Crafting shows I still have the 3 tokens to get Garen to level 7 despite already having it, as I told in the report an error ocurred while upgrading but still did. I tried to reproduce the bug with Darius (have the 3 tokens required) but with no sucess, I have video on how to reproduce it but with no result.

http://prntscr.com/cljxhi  - Ingame level 7 emote

http://prntscr.com/clk0nb  -  Loading screen banner

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7rFs9srOvho - I made this clip to show exactly how I did the bug with Garen, I tried to reproduce it with Darius but as you see I couldn't do it

I hope this was helpful and I wish to give more information if required
Yes, it happened to me too.
